Compliance description: Check if the code includes methods to collect raw data from databases, APIs, sensors, web scraping, or user inputs.
Assess if the code includes an annotation system for supervised learning tasks, such as manual or automated labeling.
Assess whether the code includes checks to maintain data quality and consistency throughout preprocessing.
Check if the code computes relevant metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score for classification, or RMSE, MAE for regression.
Verify if the code includes logic to compute and analyze the confusion matrix to assess false positives and false negatives.
Check if the code identifies patterns in incorrect predictions and provides insights for improvement.
Check if the code evaluates the modelâ€™s generalization ability using a validation set.
Assess if the code includes proper logic to train the selected model on the dataset.
Verify if the code logs key metrics like accuracy, latency, and throughput in production.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to track shifts in input data distribution.
